title: Getting Started with the Pixel Art Maker
excerpt: A quick guide to turn any PNG/JPG into clean pixel art with instant preview and export.
body: Pixel Art Village lets you pixelate images online — fast, private, and free.
Upload a PNG/JPG, adjust pixel size and palettes with live preview, and export crisp results for sprites, icons, or retro graphics.
Tip: start from a high‑contrast source. Larger pixel sizes create a stronger 8‑bit look; smaller sizes preserve more detail.

title: Photo to Sprite Converter: Practical Tips
excerpt: From photo to 8‑bit sprite: palette, contrast, and grid settings that work.
body: For readable sprites, limit your palette and keep silhouettes clear.
Use the grid to inspect pixel clusters. Tweak contrast and brightness until edges stay crisp at your target size.
Export as PNG to preserve transparency and keep your game assets ready to drop in.
